task.summary: Working inital DB, inserted intiial values in it.
Teh query methods use find by description and get the instance of the object
Made a bootstrap class to initialize all the values into the Database. Check the RecipeBootstrap for more clarity.
Removed unused imports and checked the working, latest commit
Initial commit, refactored the classes according to project Lombok
Managed circular reference as a bi directional mapping has to be handled and the same has to be excluded. Look at the code in Note, Recipe, Ingredient and Category.
Managed the intermittent error with lazy loading. You can use @Transaction to instruct that the whole context should execute as the same transaction.
Added Bootstrap to make the table look nicer.
Added unite tests for both Junit and Mockito to run test cases. Check both commits.
You can also add Jquery and Bootstrap from thymeleaf scripts that can fetch values from the dependencies brought from the pom.xml.
Added Show page to display the recipes, Taking values from the URL and sending it to the controller. Check the controller for Recipe for a clearer idea. Added appropriate tests for the same.
I added a couple of command objects to model our data model. We also have to convert the domain object to the Command object.
